import{useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import LoadingSkeleton from'../components/LoadingSkeleton';import PalpiteGrid from'../components/PalpiteGrid';import MainLayout from'../layouts/MainLayout';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function GerarAvancado(){const[apostas,setApostas]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[tipo,setTipo]=useState('premium');const gerar=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{// try multiple endpoints for compatibility
